recipesJson.name: Bourbon Fried Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: trandism
recipesJson.description: A remix of the fabulous idea by Tootall with more convenient ingredients for European mixers and an extra twist with CAP Funnel Cake that I found to be working great in this profile. Of course any good reviews on this must go to the original recipe.

reviews.text: Never had Bourbon Fried Ice Cream but it's a damn tasty recipe... Maybe a lil bit more on the shell coating would help, but overall it's a nice light vape... Good work! üëçüëç
